--- alter_table_add_constraint_foreign_key_on_delete_no_action.sql
alter table foo add constraint fkname foreign key (foo, bar) references t2 (t2key1, t2key2) on delete no action

--- AST
&ast.AlterTable{
  Alter: 0,
  Name:  &ast.Path{
    Idents: []*ast.Ident{
      &ast.Ident{
        NamePos: 12,
        NameEnd: 15,
        Name:    "foo",
      },
    },
  },
  TableAlteration: &ast.AddTableConstraint{
    Add:             16,
    TableConstraint: &ast.TableConstraint{
      ConstraintPos: 20,
      Name:          &ast.Ident{
        NamePos: 31,
        NameEnd: 37,
        Name:    "fkname",
      },
      Constraint: &ast.ForeignKey{
        Foreign:     38,
        Rparen:      90,
        OnDeleteEnd: 111,
        Columns:     []*ast.Ident{
          &ast.Ident{
            NamePos: 51,
            NameEnd: 54,
            Name:    "foo",
          },
          &ast.Ident{
            NamePos: 56,
            NameEnd: 59,
            Name:    "bar",
          },
        },
        ReferenceTable: &ast.Path{
          Idents: []*ast.Ident{
            &ast.Ident{
              NamePos: 72,
              NameEnd: 74,
              Name:    "t2",
            },
          },
        },
        ReferenceColumns: []*ast.Ident{
          &ast.Ident{
            NamePos: 76,
            NameEnd: 82,
            Name:    "t2key1",
          },
          &ast.Ident{
            NamePos: 84,
            NameEnd: 90,
            Name:    "t2key2",
          },
        },
        OnDelete: "ON DELETE NO ACTION",
      },
    },
  },
}

--- SQL
ALTER TABLE foo ADD CONSTRAINT fkname FOREIGN KEY (foo, bar) REFERENCES t2 (t2key1, t2key2) ON DELETE NO ACTION
